title: Exclusive: Mason RAW prototype steel adventure mountain bike with Hunt dynamo
content:
Mason apparently has a new steel hardtail adventure mountain bike in the works, as ultra-endurance racer Josh Ibbett has packed up a bright shiny yellow prototype with Miss Grape bikepacking bags to take on this weekend’s Highland Trail 550 up in Scotland, and given us an exclusive detailed sneak peek. Looking to take the ISO […]

The post Exclusive: Mason RAW prototype steel adventure mountain bike with Hunt dynamo appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
